commit.message:
mvn clean verify works fine #SYNCOPE-143

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/trunk@1607109 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:
@@ -44,7 +44,6 @@ under the License.
   <properties>
     <staging.dir>${project.build.directory}/staging</staging.dir>
     <izpack.version>5.0.0-rc2</izpack.version>
-    <installer-output-filename>apache-syncope-installer.jar</installer-output-filename>
   </properties>
 
   <dependencies>
@@ -100,8 +99,6 @@ under the License.
   
     <defaultGoal>package</defaultGoal>
   
-    <finalName>installer</finalName>
-  
     <pluginManagement>
       <plugins>
         <plugin>
@@ -139,8 +136,8 @@ under the License.
         <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
         <version>3.1</version>
         <configuration>
-          <source>1.6</source>
-          <target>1.6</target>
+          <source>1.7</source>
+          <target>1.7</target>
           <optimize>true</optimize>
           <debug>true</debug>
         </configuration>
@@ -158,7 +155,6 @@ under the License.
             </goals>
             <configuration>
               <outputDirectory>${staging.dir}</outputDirectory>
-              
               <resources>
                 <resource>
                   <directory>src/main/resources/izpack</directory>
@@ -167,7 +163,12 @@ under the License.
                   </includes>
                   <filtering>false</filtering>
                 </resource>
-                
+                <resource>
+                  <directory>..</directory>
+                  <includes>
+                    <include>LICENSE</include>
+                  </includes>
+                </resource>
               </resources>
             </configuration>
           </execution>
@@ -177,7 +178,6 @@ under the License.
       <plugin>
         <artifactId>maven-dependency-plugin</artifactId>
         <executions>
-         
           <execution>
             <id>copy-izpack-dependencies</id>
             <phase>prepare-package</phase>
@@ -195,7 +195,7 @@ under the License.
         <groupId>org.codehaus.izpack</groupId>
         <artifactId>izpack-maven-plugin</artifactId>
         <configuration>
-          <descriptorEncoding>UTF-8</descriptorEncoding>
+          <descriptorEncoding>${project.build.sourceEncoding}</descriptorEncoding>
         </configuration>
         <executions>
           <execution>
@@ -206,12 +206,22 @@ under the License.
             <configuration>
               <baseDir>${staging.dir}</baseDir>
               <installFile>${staging.dir}/install.xml</installFile>
-              <output>${project.build.directory}/${installer-output-filename}</output>
+              <output>${project.build.directory}/${project.artifactId}.jar</output>
             </configuration>
           </execution>
         </executions>
       </plugin>
- 
     </plugins>
+    
+    <resources>
+      <resource>
+        <directory>..</directory>
+        <targetPath>META-INF</targetPath>
+        <includes>
+          <include>LICENSE</include>
+          <include>NOTICE</include>
+        </includes>
+      </resource>
+    </resources>
   </build>
 </project>

@@ -118,21 +118,21 @@ under the License.
   </conditions>
   
   <resources>
-    <res id="installer.jar" src="../installer.jar"/>
+    <res id="installer.jar" src="../syncope-installer-1.2.0-SNAPSHOT.jar"/>
     
     <res id="Installer.image" src="img/apache-syncope-vert.png" />
     
     <res id="welcome_background" src="img/welcome_background.jpg" />
     <res id="HTMLHelloPanel.welcome" src="html/welcome.html"/>
-    <res id="LicencePanel.licence" src="txt/LICENSE"/>
+    <res id="LicencePanel.licence" src="LICENSE"/>
     <res id="HTMLInfoPanel.info" src="html/prerequisites.html"/>  
     <res id="userInputSpec.xml" src="userInputSpec.xml" />
     <res id="userInputLang.xml_eng" src="userInputLang.xml_eng" />
     <res id="userInputLang.xml_ita" src="userInputLang.xml_ita" />
     <res id="ProcessPanel.Spec.xml" src="ProcessPanel.Spec.xml"/>
   </resources>
   
-  <jar src="../installer.jar" stage="install"/>
+  <jar src="../syncope-installer-1.2.0-SNAPSHOT.jar" stage="install"/>
   <jar src="lib/postgresql-9.3-1101-jdbc41.jar"/>
   <jar src="lib/mysql-connector-java-5.1.31.jar"/>
   <jar src="lib/commons-logging-1.1.3.jar"/>
